room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by MindTrap Escape Room in Temecula
review: My group completed the Conspiracy room and we all had such a great time! This is the third escape room that I have done and it was by far the best. The owners were super friendly and welcoming. I would highly recommend going! Can't wait to go back and try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by MindTrap Escape Room in Temecula
review: Absolutely loved this! My first time doing an escape room. Our group had such a blast doing the Conspiracy room. Definitely looking forward to go back and doing the Gold Rush room. The owners were very friendly. I would highly recommend this to friends and family.

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by MindTrap Escape Room in Temecula
review: Did the Conspiracy room tonight with a group of 4. It was sooo fun! Staff were super friendly and helpful. We had such a great time and would say this is one of the highest quality escape rooms we’ve been too! Can’t wait to try out their gold rush!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by MindTrap Escape Room in Temecula
review: I played the Conspiracy room. It was so much! Great detail and high-quality puzzles! I highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by MindTrap Escape Room in Temecula
review: Such a great escape room! I took my employees here for a team building game and we had a blast! Both The Conspiracy Theory room and the Gold Rush room have great aesthetics, great story and great puzzles! I would definitely recommend them!
